articles.title: European official sees clear 'association' between AstraZeneca vaccine and rare blood clots in brain - CTV News
articles.description: A senior official at Europe's medicines regulator has said there is a clear 'association' between AstraZeneca's COVID-19 vaccine and very rare blood clots in the brain, though the direct cause of the clots is still unknown.
